Dashboard.HowSendMoney: How to send money to your account
Dashboard.UseCurrency: Use the following bank details to receive {{currency}} to your account.
Dashboard.MouseOver: On mouse over you can copy the account details
NoBanking.Description:
By financial regulations we are required to collect some necessary data from you to be able to set up a bank account with Klearing.
Our compliance team is currently processing your banking application.
As soon as this is completed you will be notified and requested to do a first deposit to activate the account.

Best regards,
{{name}}
